reviews.review_text: Old school turn-based RPG action with an engaging story, interesting NPCs, a surprising degree of non-linearity. Add in deep character customization and actions that actually have long-term (and sometimes surprising, unintended consequences) and you've got a gem with some true replay value.

An old school dungeon crawler that has kept me entertained and enthralled for more hours than even steam can register. I played this game back when DOS was a necessity to even think about playing a game. It was fantastic then and just as good as I remember it, giving both a fun and challenging experience to any would be RPG fan.   Just do yourself a favor-- avoid the gold edition.
